Package index

Package help

crew.cluster-package
crew.cluster: crew launcher plugins for traditional high-performance computing clusters

LSf

crew_controller_lsf()
Create a controller with a LSF launcher.
crew_launcher_lsf()
Create a launcher with LSF workers.
crew_class_launcher_lsf
LSF launcher class

PBS

crew_controller_pbs()
Create a controller with a PBS/TORQUE launcher.
crew_launcher_pbs()
Create a launcher with PBS or TORQUE workers.
crew_class_launcher_pbs
PBS/TORQUE launcher class

SGE

crew_controller_sge()
Create a controller with a Sun Grid Engine (SGE) launcher.
crew_launcher_sge()
Create a launcher with Sun Grid Engine (SGE) workers.
crew_class_launcher_sge
SGE launcher class
crew_monitor_sge()
Create a SGE monitor object.
crew_class_monitor_sge
SGE monitor class

SLURM

crew_controller_slurm()
Create a controller with a SLURM launcher.
crew_launcher_slurm()
Create a launcher with SLURM workers.
crew_class_launcher_slurm
SLURM launcher class
crew_monitor_slurm()
Create a SLURM monitor object.
crew_class_monitor_slurm
SLURM monitor class
